ListingPage.BigSpenderDescription: Origin able to spend up to 1,000,000 DOT from the treasury at onceShow.
ListingPage.BigTipperDescription: Origin able to spend up to 1000 DOT from the treasury at onceShow.
ListingPage.BountyDescription: A space to share insights, provide feedback, and collaborate on ideas that impact the network.
ListingPage.ChildBountyDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain child bounties. Child Bounty posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on-chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.
ListingPage.DiscussionDescription: A space to share insights, provide feedback, and collaborate on ideas that impact the network.
ListingPage.FellowshipAdminDescription: Origin for managing the composition of the fellowshipShow.
ListingPage.LeaseAdminDescription: Origin able to force slot leases
ListingPage.MediumSpenderDescription: Origin able to spend up to 100,000 DOT from the treasury at once.
ListingPage.MembersDescription: Open Tech Committee Members is a mostly self-governing expert body with a primary goal of representing the humans who embody and contain the technical knowledge base of the Polkadot network and protocol.
ListingPage.ReferendumDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain referenda. On-chain posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on the chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.
ListingPage.SmallSpenderDescription: Origin able to spend up to 250 DOT from the treasury at once.
ListingPage.SmallTipperDescription: Origin able to spend up to 250 DOT from the treasury at once.
ListingPage.TreasurerDescription: Origin for spending (any amount of) funds until the upper limit of 10,000,000 DOT.
ListingPage.WhitelistedCallerDescription: Origin commanded by any members of the Polkadot Fellowship (no Dan grade needed).
ListingPage.WishForChangeDescription: Origin for signaling that the network wishes for some change.
ListingPage.TechCommitteeProposalDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain tech committee proposals. On-chain posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on the chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.
ListingPage.DemocracyProposalDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain proposals. On-chain posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on the chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.
ListingPage.TreasuryProposalDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain treasury proposals. On-chain posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on the chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.
ListingPage.TipDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain tips. On-chain posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on the chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.
ListingPage.CouncilMotionDescription: This is the place to discuss on-chain motions. On-chain posts are automatically generated as soon as they are created on the chain. Only the proposer is able to edit them.

SetIdentity.identityDescription1: Polkadot offers on-chain identities that verify users' credentials through appointed registrars, instilling greater trust and support.
SetIdentity.identityDescription2: Once successfully verified, users receive a green checkmark, symbolising their trusted status. This verified status symbol enhances trustworthiness when requesting funds from the treasury or participating in discussions and proposals.
SetIdentity.successDescription: Your identity has been set successfully
SetIdentity.failedDescription: There was an error while setting your identity
SetIdentity.verificationEmailSentDescription: Please check your email for verification
SetIdentity.emailNotSentDescription: There was an error while sending the verification email
SetIdentity.IdentityNotSetDescription: To request a judgment, you need to have your on-chain identity set first.
SetIdentity.IdentityNotSetDescription2: Judgment is a way for registrars to verify your profile and provide a level of trustworthiness based on your identity information (such as display name, email, website, legal name, etc.).
SetIdentity.IdentityNotSetDescription3: Once you've set your identity, you can request a judgment from a registrar. This judgment will be visible to others and helps you build credibility on-chain.
SetIdentity.clearIdentitySuccessDescription: Your identity has been cleared successfully
SetIdentity.clearIdentityFailedDescription: There was an error while clearing your identity
SetIdentity.clearIdentityDescription: Are you sure you want to clear your identity?

Judgements.registrarDescription: An entity or individual authorized to verify and validate the identity of accounts. Registrars can set a fee for their services and limit their attestation to certain fields.
Judgements.becomeRegistrarDescription: To become a registrar on Polkadot, you need to submit a referendum proposal and get it approved by the community. Here's how:

becomeRegistrarSteps.step1: Submit a referendum proposal requesting to become a registrar
becomeRegistrarSteps.step2: The proposal will be voted on by the community
becomeRegistrarSteps.step3: If approved, you'll be added to the registrar list
becomeRegistrarSteps.step4: You can then set your fee and start providing identity verification services

Judgements.searchByAddressOrName: Enter address or name to search

ConvictionSelector.lockingPeriodDescription: Your {tokenSymbol} will stay locked for extra time after voting, depending on the multiplier you choose.

GovAnalytics.governanceAnalyticsDescription: Referenda are the core mechanism of Polkadotâ€™s on-chain governance, allowing stakeholders (DOT holders) to make decisions about network upgrades, treasury spending, and other important matters.

Proxies.delayTooltip: Delay acts as a security feature: after the proxy announces its intended action, there is a 24-hour window during which the action can be reviewed and, if necessary, canceled by the controlling account before it is executed. Since Polkadot has an average block time of about 6 seconds, a delay of 14,400 blocks translates to approximately 24 hours.

AnnouncementBanner.assethubMigration: Notice: {network} has migrated to AssetHub. Balances, data, referenda, and other on-chain activity has moved to AssetHub.
AnnouncementBanner.polkadotMigration: Notice: Polkadot is undergoing AssetHub migration. Some features may be unavailable during the migration.
